name: Lego Star wars beta 1.0.3
description:
Controlls:

[Xbox controller support]

 Q= special attack.

 C= character selection.

 X = cheat codes(for you who want to get every thing free)

 W A S D to walk.

 space bar = basic attack.

 E for level 2 shield or melee attack(only some characters)

p+2 for 2 players. (i wont list P2 controls because it's a beta feature)

F= to toggle lightsaber swords etc.

Versions:

Feel free to write all cheat codes in the comments.

version:1.0.3 added new cheat code added better lightsaber throw and changed p2 controls A bit. Completely removed the intro. (temp) (added some Beta features that will lead to A major update!)

version:1.0.2 added lightsaber for obi wan and vibrosword for commando droid and voice line for obi wan (hello there)

version:1.0.1 added obi wan Kenobi

version:1.0 release
